00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Declaration and implementation of the Dirac delta type invariant mass *
00013  * sampler, for on-shell particle propagator sampling.                   *
00014  *                                                                       *
00015  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00016 
00017 #include <sstream>
00018 #include <Camorra/utils.h>
00019 #include <Camgen/logging.h>
00020 #include <Camgen/s_gen.h>
00021 #include <Camgen/s_int.h>
00022 
00023 namespace Camorra
00024 {
00025     /* On-shell momentum generator channel class. */
00026 
00027     template<class value_t,class rng_t>class Dd_s_generator: public s_generator<value_t,rng_t>
00028     {
00029         friend class s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>;
00030         typedef s_generator<value_t,rng_t> base_type;
00031 
00032         public:
00033 
00034             /* Type definitions: */
00035 
00036             typedef value_t value_type;
00037             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00038             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00039 
00040             /* Public data members: */
00041             /*----------------------*/
00042 
00043             /* Mass address: */
00044 
00045             const value_type* const m;
00046 
00047             /* Public constructors: */
00048             /*----------------------*/
00049 
00050             /* Default constructor with (optional) mass address argument. */
00051 
00052             Dd_s_generator(const value_type* m_=NULL):m(m_),mm(squareval(m)){}
00053 
00054             /* Constructor with momentum and (optional) mass address argument.
00055              * */
00056 
00057             Dd_s_generator(value_type* s_,const value_type* m_=NULL):base_type(s_),m(m_),mm(squareval(m)){}
00058 
00059             /* Copy constructor: */
00060 
00061             Dd_s_generator(const Dd_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>& other):base_type(other),m(other.m),mm(other.mm){}
00062 
00063             /* Public modifiers: */
00064             /*-------------------*/
00065 
00066             /* Parameter refresher function. */
00067 
00068             bool refresh_params()
00069             {
00070                 mm=squareval(m);
00071                 refresh_norm();
00072                 return this->normalisable();
00073             }
00074 
00075             /* Generation method. */
00076 
00077             bool generate()
00078             {
00079                 if(!this->normalisable())
00080                 {
00081                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00082                     return false;
00083                 }
00084                 this->s()=mm;
00085                 this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00086                 return true;
00087             }
00088 
00089             /* Public const methods: */
00090             /*-----------------------*/
00091 
00092             /* Virtual cloning method. */
00093 
00094             virtual Dd_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* clone() const
00095             {
00096                 return new Dd_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>(*this);
00097             }
00098 
00099             /* Mass output. */
00100 
00101             value_type mass() const
00102             {
00103                 return (m==NULL)?(value_type)0:(*m);
00104             }
00105 
00106             /* Mass-squared output. */
00107 
00108             value_type mass2() const
00109             {
00110                 return mm;
00111             }
00112 
00113             /* Mapping implementation: */
00114 
00115             value_type map(const value_type& r) const
00116             {
00117                 return mm;
00118             }
00119 
00120             /* Inverse mapping implementation: */
00121 
00122             value_type inverse_map(const value_type& s) const
00123             {
00124                 return s;
00125             }
00126 
00127             /* Double-dispatch integrator functions. */
00128             
00129             value_type integrate_with(const s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00130             {
00131                 return gen->integrate_with(this,sqrts);
00132             }
00133             value_type integrate_with(const BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00134             {
00135                 typedef BW_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> type;
00136                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::template integrate<type>(static_cast<const inversion_s_generator<value_t,rng_t,type>*>(gen),this,sqrts);
00137             }
00138             value_type integrate_with(const pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00139             {
00140                 typedef pl_s_generator<value_t,rng_t> type;
00141                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::template integrate<type>(static_cast<const inversion_s_generator<value_t,rng_t,type>*>(gen),this,sqrts);
00142             }
00143             value_type integrate_with(const uni_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00144             {
00145                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::integrate(gen,this,sqrts);
00146             }
00147             value_type integrate_with(const Dd_s_generator<value_t,rng_t>* gen,const value_type& sqrts) const
00148             {
00149                 return s_integrator<value_t,rng_t>::integrate(this,gen,sqrts);
00150             }
00151 
00152             /* Serialization: */
00153             /*----------------*/
00154 
00155             /* Overridden printing function: */
00156 
00157             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) const
00158             {
00159                 os<<"Dd("<<mass()<<')';
00160                 return os;
00161             }
00162 
00163             /* Outputs the type of the generator. */
00164 
00165             std::string type() const
00166             {
00167                 return "Dd";
00168             }
00169 
00170             /* Outputs the type of the generator. */
00171 
00172             std::string detailed_type() const
00173             {
00174                 std::stringstream ss;
00175                 ss<<"Dd("<<mass()<<')';
00176                 return ss.str();
00177             }
00178 
00179         protected:
00180 
00181             /* Normalisation refresher: */
00182 
00183             void refresh_norm()
00184             {
00185                 bool q=(mm>=this->s_min() and mm<=this->s_max());
00186                 this->norm=q?(value_type)1:(value_type)0;
00187             }
00188 
00189             /* Fast weight evaluation method: */
00190 
00191             value_type get_fast_weight() const
00192             {
00193                 return equals(this->s(),mm)?(value_type)1:(value_type)0;
00194             }
00195 
00196         private:
00197 
00198             /* Square utility: */
00199 
00200             static value_type squareval(const value_type* x)
00201             {
00202                 return (x==NULL)?(value_type)0:(*x)*(*x);
00203             }
00204 
00205             /* Squared mass data member: */
00206 
00207             value_type mm;
00208     };
00209 }
00210 
00211 #endif /*DIRAC_DELTA_H_*/
